Description:
Let’s turn visions into reality. At Bosch, we shape the future by inventing high-quality technologies and services that spark enthusiasm and enrich people’s lives. Our areas of activity are every bit as diverse as our outstanding Bosch teams around the world. Their creativity is the key to innovation through connected living, mobility or industry. Our promise to our associates is rock-solid: we grow together, we enjoy our work, and we inspire each other. Join in and feel the difference.
Every year, several thousands of young people on practical placements with Bosch experience daily work at first hand. With this long term internship opportunity they are actively integrated into projects and are fully incorporated in the daily work of one of the world's largest industrial corporations. The new specialist experience you gather will help you choose the future focus of your studies and the way you wish to launch your professional career. One thing is sure: Exciting and interesting tasks await you!Students enrolled in University Engineering and Economic Management Science departments can work minimum three days per week in our Istanbul Headquarters or Bursa & Manisa Plants.
We are currently offering an opportunity for a highly motivated and enthusiastic individual to join us in starting something remarkable as a Foraign Trade Smart Start.Your contribution to something big:Assist foreign trade team by supporting operational tasks.
Daily support and preparation of all relevant documents
 Operational support of all customs  activities
Assist to  foreign trade team in processes and procedures, all internal contacts and coordinations.
Supporting foreign trade projects by analyzing and reporting.
Preparing, analyzing and follow ups the variety of foreign trade reports.
Following up the archive studiesWhat distinguishes you:3rd or 4th year of Bachelor student of Logistics, engineering or business administration.
Excellent command of written and spoken English
Self motivated, solution and target-oriented perspective, strong communication skill
Able to work  3 days during school period.
